author: daniellehrner
content: <@968526635735326741> EIP-8037 defines the SSTORE refund for slot restoration, 0→X→0 in the same tx. But does not mention anything specifically about "normal" refunds with X→0. Does this stay the same as pre-EIP-8037? Or should we refund state_gas as well, similar to the 0→X→0 pattern?
